channel.title: New download publisher function on Registry
channel.description:
Hi all,
The Tech Team is pleased to announce that we have implemented a ’Download List’ function on the [Publisher List](https://iatiregistry.org/publisher) page on the Registry.
The function allows users to instantly download the latest list of active publishers in CSV, XLS, XML or JSON formats.
**NOTE:** If you are using the [IATI Decipher](https://www.publishwhatyoufund.org/projects/iati-decipher/) extension on Chrome or Firefox, the download button may not work correctly until your extension has been automatically updated to the latest version. See the [GitHub issue](https://github.com/pwyf/iati-decipher/issues/106) for details.

item.title: New download publisher function on Registry
item.dc:creator: matmaxgeds
item.source: New download publisher function on Registry

item.title: New download publisher function on Registry
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
Hi Matt,

The following is in fact the query that you want to use to get the same list as the Registry. The previous one that I suggested looks at organisations that are published in the reporting-org field and therefore won’t necessarily match with the list of actual publishers.

https://test-datastore.iatistandard.org/api/publishers/?&format=json&is_active=True

Josh

Read full topic
item.source: New download publisher function on Registry

item.title: New download publisher function on Registry
item.dc:creator: JoshStanley
item.description:
Hi Matt,

I think this query should give you what you’re after:

https://test-datastore.iatistandard.org/api/organisations/?format=json&is_reporting_organisation=True

Note that the actual count of publishers may not sync exactly with the Registry while we are in the DS testing phase.

Thanks,
Josh

Read full topic
item.source: New download publisher function on Registry

item.title: New download publisher function on Registry
item.dc:creator: matmaxgeds
item.description:
Cool - is there a way to get the same list from the new Datastore? I think there was going to be a flag to have it only return active publishers, but can’t remember what it was?

Read full topic
